website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight hydration for every skin type.
pros: Gel-like consistency is hydrating without being greasy
This ginkgo- and ginseng-based formula is gentle on sensitive skin
cons: Some users find the gel leaves a sticky feeling

customer_reviews.title: It's ok & doesn't set off skin's reactive nature
customer_reviews.text: I've used several of MD products. This is ok for dry skin in a dry high desert climate. My skin's reactive. No problems so that's great. I haven't noticed any fragrance. The blue color doesnt transfer to the skin. Delivered ontime & packed well. This is 1 of the MD that doesn't come in a box, just the plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY thing that helps my dry skin, and I have tried everything! Highly reccomend for anyone struggling with severely dry/sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff completely changed my acne prone skin. My skin is super hydrated and not as prone to breakouts, and I attribute this to not using a greasy moisturizer. a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Tara Stiner

customer_reviews.title: LITERALLY THE BEST MOISTURIZER.
customer_reviews.text: THE best lightweight moisturizing serum money can buy (in my opinion). The right ingredients for calming irritated skin, and helping new skin stay healthy. Would literally recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: God send for people in dry climates!
customer_reviews.text: Cold dry air where I live. Even just dabbing some on my lips makes them go soft so quickly it’s shocking. I am a religious user of this product. Every morning I use it under my moisturizer & spf.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good for Sensitive/Dry
customer_reviews.text: Serum comes out weird like a gel, but I actually really like it that way. I hate how watery serums are, but this goes on really smooth and leaves my skin soft. Also doesn't irritate my skin, which is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great base for makeup
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this as a base for makeup.
customer_reviews.author: LILUSHA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I like the way it feels on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary oxendine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get moisture deep into pores
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, use it under the kera moisturizer in the spring/summer/fall, and in the winter use under the kera moist cream. I feel like it gets deep into the pores because it's thin, and then I put the thicker moisturizer or cream on top of it, and then my dry skin stays hydrated all day long.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lehmicke

customer_reviews.title: An excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizer for acne skin. Not oily at all but very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as hydrating as expected. Couldn't really tell if it made a difference
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Wish it wasn't so expensive and came in a bigger bottle. Only reason why I gave it 4 stars. Other than that great product!
customer_reviews.author: morgan s.

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates without oiliness.
customer_reviews.text: Works really nice with my NuFace instead of using the NuFace gel primer. Even when used as my only moisturizer it hydrates my face without leaving oily residue.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca21

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates deeply
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Mario Badescu products for years, but just tried this Herbal Hydrating Serum. Other reviewers have mentioned that this serum is thicker than most serums. Though the Herbal Hydrating Serum feels thick it doesn't feel greasy or oily. It let my skin feeling a little tacky, but not uncomfortable. I've been using this serum in NYC in August when it is hot and humid, I expect that this will work really well while traveling and in colder, drier weather. The directions suggest using the serum over moisturizer or instead of moisturizer. The packaging is simple and straightforward - the bottle is squeezable and is similar to an eye drop bottle. The serum comes out easily,
customer_reviews.author: Gaby at Starting Fresh blog

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates and makes my skin look less patchy and flaky after applying foundation.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great serum, it works by itself in the summer or fall to keep skin hydrated and will also work over a moisturizer. I sometimes mix a little foundation in my moisturizer to give it a BB cream type of effect, but then the drier parts of my face start flaking. This hydrating serum is perfect to apply over the moisturizer as it makes the flakiness go away. I used to use Mario Badescu spray earlier but that made my face too shiny. This works better. It contains water and glycerin with some herbal ingredients to hydrate and protect the face. It's a bit expensive so I am rating it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect hydrating product! The Mario Badescu Herbal Hydrating Serum works for all skin types. The serum is more like a gel that goes on smoothly and evenly and leaves absolutely no greasy residue. This can be worn under makeup or overnight. Pair with the Mario Badescu buttermilk moisturizer for sweet smelling soft skin. I love MB products- They are of excellent quality, not at all harsh on the skin, and they are at a good price point. Like the other MB products I have tried, the Herbal Hydrating Serum has no strong odor or chemical feel. Another winner from Mario Badescu!
customer_reviews.author: Krisilou

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive/combo skin...
customer_reviews.text: I am frequently on international long-haul flights and my sensitive/combo skin suffers for it. This serum is great to apply every 3-4 hours while in flight...keeps it moisturized, relieves redness (from mild rosacea), and break-out free. It also wears well underneath mineral makeup...even during humid Florida summer months when my face produces a lot more oil. I love this serum!
customer_reviews.author: kstay

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the way the Mario Badescu Herbal Hydrating Serum felt ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the way the Mario Badescu Herbal Hydrating Serum felt over or under my moisturizer or my face. However, I have been using this on my elbows that have extremely dry skin and it has almost turned them baby soft. Even my prescription medicine could not do what this serum has done. I plan to try it on a couple of dry spots on my feet next. This is a small bottle but it only take a small amount so I would say it will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: RNS

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan (C- Grade)
customer_reviews.text: This serum aka moisturizer has a strange consistency to it. It's somewhat greasy and a little gooey. After using it a few times, I found little results, and it made my skin feel oily. I wasn't impressed with this product at all. It's something I wouldn't recommend or use again. I would stick to more traditional types of skin care products. Katiebabs
customer_reviews.author: Katie Babs

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing, slightly tacky to touch moisturizer; has a faint scent. Refreshing feel.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit pricey for 1 oz of moisturizer and does feel like its making the skin smoother,. It is light, not oily, and felt nicely hydrating under foundation in my drying work environment. It also was fine to put on my skin at night. It comes out blue, which I wasn't crazy about, but doesn't add any visible tint to the skin. It is smoothing, but you can feel it on your skin if you rub it. Moisturizes nicely overall.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa 20

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Mario Badescu products for years, but mostly for preventing acne. Now that I'm older, I need to use moisturizing products. I'm happy to say that the Herbal Hydrating Serum has no scent. It's a gel serum that makes your face feel cool and smooth. This is a 1 oz bottle, but you only need a tiny amount to use. I used it over my moisturizer, but you can use it alone too. I'm impressed with this serum. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keeping Your Skin From Feeling Dry in Hot, Humid Conditions
customer_reviews.text: Like other Mario Badescu products, the liquid is thick but not greasy at all when you apply it to your face. It has a gentle soothing effect and I found my skin feeling soft and well hydrated after a day running around in the hot, humid weather. Though the bottle is small, a little goes a long way and it's the perfect size for traveling. I can't imagine going on a plane without it.
customer_reviews.author: VIDFAN

customer_reviews.title: I love the entire Mario Badescu line -- I have used ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the entire Mario Badescu line -- I have used the buffering serum for awhile but find it dries out my sensitive skin. Enter the herbal hydrating serum -- this serum is more of a gel wheras the buffering is liquid. This feels nice when you apply it and appears to sink in quickly. I have always had good success with Mario Badescu products so I feel safe saying it is a well trusted brand!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Good except for the stickiness
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. Says it can be used in place of a moisturizer but I would definitely not suggest that. It is hydrating but doesn't leave skin feeling moisturized. The scent is neutral, which I find to be a positive. My biggest problem with this is that it stays feeling sticky on my skin. If not for that, I'd rate this higher for use with a good moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: DelusionalAngel

customer_reviews.title: Blessing in air conditioned living space.
customer_reviews.text: With airconditioning on all day, my skin gets very dry, especially areas under my eyes and cheek. Apply little around those areas during the day, really minimise the dryness and constant cream application. Hence avoid very simulating the oily area around my nose. Economical , tiny amount is suffice. Great for dry environments.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Yours

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Use On Combination Skin
customer_reviews.text: Flexible Use On Combination Skin As I've matured, I do pay closer attention to my skin and it's needs. I've started doing the "give it what it needs" skin treatments. I like this moisturizing serum and the flexibility it offers. Its effective with just the serum on my oily T-zone, while my dry cheeks get a moisturizer with a serum topper. When the T-zone needs no help at all it gets nothing, while my cheeks get the usual moisturizer + serum treatment. The all-or-nothing method all over my face, neck and chest I've done for YEARS wasn't working to benefit each areas needs. Can't believe it took me so long to figure it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynrie

customer_reviews.title: LIglhtweight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is a gel that goes on a little sticky but is quickly absorbed. I am using it with a moisturizer but I also tried it alone. By itself it did an ok job, but is very lightweight. In the winter I would use it as a booster for my moisturizer as I have fairly dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect Skin Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a hydrater for my sometimes oily skin! It is lightweight, non greasy and feels amazing when I use it. I love anything herbal and the scent of this product is quite lovely. I also love that it can be used both day and night.
customer_reviews.author: That’s my Patty!

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little sticky
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product though we found it a little stickier compared to similar products. While it seems to hydrate, my skin does not feel moisturized compared to moisturizing products. It also seems to work as a product booster without creating a shiny skin surface.
customer_reviews.author: ReconScout

customer_reviews.title: An extra layer of moisture
customer_reviews.text: If you feel like you need an extra layer of moisture on your skin, this product is well worth considering. It's gentle on my sensitive skin and goes on nice and matte. However, it's expensive for the small quantity you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Great hydrating serum fast absorption.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Mario Badescu before. I like that it works well with sensitive skin. This one is almost gel like and it gets absorbed quickly and deeply. Very hydrating. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating.
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating serum. It's gel like so it's enough for my skin before I apply sunscreen. Good ingredients and a little goes long way.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

product_meta.title: Mario Badescu Herbal Hydrating Serum, 1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: One of our most unique, versatile products for all skin types that doubles as a layering product to use over day or night moisturizers for extra hydration. Can also be used alone as a lightweight hydrator for oily skin. Formulated with ginkgo extract, ceramides and ginseng extracts that provide nourishing benefits for the skin.
